t_news_profile_audio::clip_card_14::goal: Record sound of where your character ends the story.
t_news_profile_audio::clip_card_5::goals: Tell us why your character is interesting.
t_news_profile_audio::clip_card_10::goal: Record sound of what your character does for fun.
t_news_profile_audio::clip_card_0::goals: Record sound of a place important to your character.
t_news_profile_audio::clip_card_9::goals: Record sound of how people respond to the character.
t_news_profile_audio::title: Profile Audio Report
t_news_profile_audio::clip_card_4::goals: Record sound of your character completing the action.
t_news_profile_audio::text_card_0::text: This template will help you report on an individual who is important to your community. The clips suggested cover the primary audio clips you will need to create a well-rounded profile. Feel free to skip clips, or use different clips as needed. Additionally, adapt the suggested questions to suit your needs.
t_news_profile_audio::clip_card_11::goal: Record sound of something important to the character.
t_news_profile_audio::clip_card_8::goals: Record sound of your character interacting with other people.
t_news_profile_audio::clip_card_3::goals: Record sound of something your character does that’s significant.
t_news_profile_audio::clip_card_12::goal: Ask: Can you please tell us about your future?
t_news_profile_audio::clip_card_7::goals: Record sound of the most important part of your character’s story.
t_news_profile_audio::clip_card_15::goal: Record sound of your character at the end of the story.
t_news_profile_audio::clip_card_2::goals: Record sound of something notable about your character.
t_news_profile_audio::clip_card_13::goal: Tell us what you think will happen next to your character.
t_news_profile_audio::clip_card_6::goals: Ask: Can you please tell us a little about what you do?
t_news_profile_audio::clip_card_1::goals: Use your own voice or ask your character to introduce themself.
